name: Expanded Stash
description: Increases stash size to 16x13. Based on https://www.nexusmods.com/diablo2resurrected/mods/13.
author: olegbl

config.name: Enable Extra Stash Tabs
config.description: Modifies your stash save files to enable the additional 4 shared stash tabs. Requires the stash tab save files to already exist.

config.name: Enable Custom Tab Names
config.description: Set a custom name for each stash tab using the fields below.

config.name: Personal Tab
config.description: Set a custom name for the Personal stash tab. Leave blank to use the default name.

config.name: Shared Tab 1
config.description: Set a custom name for the first Shared stash tab. Leave blank to use the default name.

config.name: Shared Tab 2
config.description: Set a custom name for the second Shared stash tab. Leave blank to use the default name.

config.name: Shared Tab 3
config.description: Set a custom name for the third Shared stash tab. Leave blank to use the default name.

config.name: Shared Tab 4
config.description: Set a custom name for the fourth Shared stash tab. Leave blank to use the default name.

config.name: Shared Tab 5
config.description: Set a custom name for the fifth Shared stash tab. Leave blank to use the default name.

config.name: Shared Tab 6
config.description: Set a custom name for the sixth Shared stash tab. Leave blank to use the default name.

config.name: Shared Tab 7
config.description: Set a custom name for the seventh Shared stash tab. Leave blank to use the default name.
